title: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka (Amazon MSK) to AWS Lambda
description: Create a Lambda function that uses an Amazon MSK Topic as an event source.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Lambda is a consumer application for your Kafka topic. It processes records from one or more partitions and sends the payload to the target function. Lambda continues to process batches until there are no more messages in the topic.
